channel.title: Creating Items does not work for me!
channel.description: I found the correct format under Items.xml but it never works when I type in which item I want. :( All it says is "Bad Item ID". Can someone please tell me why?? And what I have to do to fix it??

item.title: Creating Items does not work for me!
item.dc:creator: @Cloudje07 Cloudje07
item.description:
@Cloudje07 wrote:

I typed exactly what one of the forum threads says. Robin Hood Hat for example — ::item 2582 1

And it wont work. Do i have to type something else instead?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 30, 2007, 12:11:29 PM[/size][hr]Nvm, I got it to work. You’re right. So then why do they tell you to type ::item, when it actually donest even work!?!? lol

Read full topic
item.source: Creating Items does not work for me!
